mainText:
Dear Steve Jobs,

I know we have never met but if we had I would have thanked you and told 
you about all the things that you have done for me. You devotion to your 
products, company and fans was unmatched and will not be forgotten. You 
are and have always been a hero to me and I wish you could here me when 
I say "Thank you for being the man you were and I only wish you could 
have been with us longer."
header: Steve Jobs, I will miss you
author: James
